title: Account Signup
description: Please verify and confirm contact information for Infraon administrator Account. This will be used for all future communication from Team Infraon.

title: Active Users
description: A real-time user presence page displaying active session participants.

title: Address Book
description: Add location information of branch offices and support hubs.

title: Advanced Resource Configuration
description: Will provide options to update configurations of the resources available in the system.

title: Announcement
description: This Module allows users to create and manage personalized announcements, ensuring timely communication with targeted audiences.

title: API Registration
description: Register third-party APIs to integrate them with Infraon.

title: Event Association Inference
description: Uncovers relationships between asset components based on repeated event-raising patterns, providing insights into how different events are linked over time.

title: Asynchronous Task Manager
description: This module monitors background tasks using Celery for asynchronous execution and scheduling, enabling real-time operations with distributed message passing.

title: Attendance Configuration
description: Manage settings like ClockIn and ClockOut and Geofencing for accurate and flexible attendance tracking.
